description: Artist Robbi Firestone's work is featured in the NYTimes, Worth, Parade, Los Angeles Travel, Boston Herald, Huffington Post, etc. A full time artist for 30 years, clients include multi-Grammy Winners, renowned art collectors & note-able CEOs, athletes. She is available for Legit NFT projects. She served on the Board of Hollywood Council of the Arts. Firestone's art installation premiered at the United Nations. She studied art at Parsons, FIT, and Pasadena Art & Design.  www.FirestoneArt.com
